subtitles:
3967 7137 What's the matter,
you don't see the resemblance?

7217 9467 Now, let's take it
from the top, friend.

9557 13057 With a lot of detail.
What do you say?

13187 16647 He had a bird with him.
Nearly pecked my face off.

16727 20107 He told me to tell T-bird
that death was on its way.

22487 26277 Draven. He said his name
was Eric Draven.

29487 34167 This bird man, he just happened
to let you live, huh?

34247 38627 You sure you ain't making all this up
just to save your own ass?
38667 41377 I ain't making all this up.

41457 45967 I ain't twisted
like you two fucks.

54557 59567 A boy and his bird.
Awful touching.

69827 72827 For fuck's sake, die, will ya?
Give me that thing.

82127 84417 Funboy said he saw
a black bird too.

87177 92057 Then he choked to death
on his own blood.

92137 96057 I'll have the janitor
come on up.

183157 185867 I don't know how many times I
gotta tell you. We're in this together!
185947 188867 One part falls, it all falls!

188947 192417 - You know how long it took us to put this together?
- Yeah, a long time.

192457 195037 That piece of ratshit made Tin Tin
into a fucking voodoo doll!

200337 204547 Fire it up! Fire it up!
Fire it up! Fire it up!

256437 260017 What the fuck are
you supposed to be, man?

288297 291557 - Oh, shit!
- What the fuck's the matter with you?

302607 307027 What do you want, man?
Money? Drugs? I got it.

308657 311527 We could use you.
You did Tin Tin.

321917 324337 I hate this.
They can't even call it cream legally.

335307 338017 When they flash us like that,
they ain't friends.

343607 346567 This is Vehicle 48. We got us
a big, old, red hot rod.

352617 355367 You got something personal, amigo,
we can work it out.

375007 377227 Oh, my God!
Get outta the way!

405877 409587 Oh, I hate this.
This ain't good.

432697 435947 But I don't know what...
What? Huh? What?

435987 438787 What are you talking about?
No, no, no, no, no.

438827 441957 You mean that place downtown?
Yeah, I remember her.

441997 444167 We needed to put some fear
into that little lady.

444247 447497 She wasn't going along
with our tenant relocation program.

447587 451167 And her idiot boyfriend shows up
and turns a simple sweep-and-clear...

451257 454677 into a total cluster fuck!
Who gives a shit?

454757 458007 It's ancient history!
Why? What do you want?

458097 463017 What is it? What?
Speak to me. Speak!

474027 479237 I know you. I know you.
I knew I knew you.

479287 483367 I knew I knew you.
But you ain't you.

483537 487457 You can't be you. We put you through
the window. There ain't no coming back.

487537 491007 This is the really real world.
There ain't no coming back.

491047 493417 We killed you dead.
There ain't no coming back.

498047 501017 There ain't no coming back!
There ain't no coming back!
511227 514197 and felt how awful goodness is."

584177 586477 This is the 7:00 a.m. edition
of Action News.

586557 588897 For over a decade,
the night before Halloween...

588937 593317 has had a darker and deadlier nickname
in the inner city, "Devil's Night"...

593397 596817 the name given to what has become
an annual plague of arson.

596897 602277 Last year over 200 blazes were reported,
and 11 people lost their lives.

602327 607497 Tonight may become the biggest
and deadliest Devil's Night ever.

607577 611207 The mayor has fire fighters
from all surrounding counties...

611287 615087 Do you like them up or over?
I can't remember.

617127 619837 What are you doing?
I don't even like eggs.

619927 624847 - Wait, you loved eggs.
- Yeah, when I was five.

624927 629057 So what do you want now?
Black coffee and cigarettes?

629137 632477 So what did you take
to become mother of the year?

632517 637647 Oh, it wasn't drugs.
Someone kind of woke me up.

643527 648787 You're acting weird. Did you win
the lottery or something, Darla?

651287 655587 Oh, forget it. I never was
too good at this mommy shit.

680277 683197 This is the third hit
in your hood in 24 hours.

683277 686527 We just fished this out of the river.
He's fused to his own car.

686617 690827 - We're gonna have to I.D. his teeth.
- His name is T-bird.

692917 694877 Looks like he zigged
when he should have zagged.

707007 710557 I got a goddamn vigilante killer
knocking off scumbags left and right...

713977 716397 Who's the cartoon character
in the painted face?

716477 720357 - You're the detective. You tell me.
- Okay.

720437 722567 Gideon's blows all to hell and you're
having a chitchat with some weirdo...

722647 725527 who winds up in T-bird's car
when it zigs instead of zags.

725567 728527 Then you steal one of
my case files from homicide...

728617 730537 and you're saying this is
just a fucking automobile accident?

730617 732907 - Come on!
- Yeah. Good speech though.

732997 734997 I didn't want to interrupt you.
It sounded good.
735077 737077 You gotta write that shit down.

739127 742217 The captain's got a little
love note waiting for you.

742257 746217 - Welcome to the first day of the rest of your suspension.
- Suspension?

807527 810367 - Come here.
- ... three for a girl, four for a boy.

908507 912257 You said,
"Can't rain all the time."
912337 915597 That is from your song, right?
925517 928647 Come on, Eric. I know you're here.

943497 948127 The hell with you.
I thought you cared.

964767 968107 But he looked different. He was painted
up white like some kind of dead whore.

968187 971437 I seen him. T-bird sent me in
for some road beers, right?

971527 974067 Then he took him away.
But I chased him down.

974157 976947 And he flash fried T-bird
to his fucking car!

980617 984537 Maybe we oughta just videotape this.
Play it back in slow motion.

985877 990457 - Fire it up! Fire it up!
- You see the grave?

998927 1002177 He's working his way back
to this speed freak right here.

1004977 1008147 That boy was out of control.
T- bird, he came in, he says...

1008227 1011527 ..."Waste them both." And now
this ghost gonna kill my ass next!

1015567 1018657 This ghost gonna
kill my ass next.

1026457 1029627 - They have all arrived.
- Watch him.

1048347 1052317 He like his plain
or with onions?

1055857 1059987 When someone's dead,
they can't come back, can they?

1062697 1065497 Are you referring
to anyone in particular?

1067867 1071497 Yeah, well, then maybe
they'll have to lock us both up.

1071587 1076917 - You see him too?
- I saw somebody.
1080597 1083507 Eric didn't come back for me.

1083597 1088347 He can't be my friend anymore
because I'm alive.

1088437 1091607 You want a friend
to walk you home?

1188737 1192157 It seems our friend T-bird won't be
joining us this evening...

1192247 1194327 on account of
a slight case of death.

1205007 1206967 I thought we'd throw
a little party...

1207007 1210307 start a bunch of fires,
make a little profit.

1215607 1219527 Problem is, it's all been done before.
You see what I'm saying?

1219567 1224777 - That's no reason to quit.
- Wrong. Best reason to quit.

1246047 1249807 See, that's what's
been bothering me, boys.

1249887 1252677 But I'll tell ya, when I used
to think about the idea itself...
1252767 1255847 it'd put a big old smile on my face.

1271197 1273497 - What about Devil's Night?
- What about it?

1273577 1276997 I started the first fires
in this goddamn city.

1277037 1280127 Before I knew it, every charlatan
and shitheel was imitating me.

1280207 1283667 Do you know
what they got now?

1293217 1298017 The idea has become
the institution, boys.

1300187 1302607 You don't want us to do
"Light My Fire" time for the whole city?

1305237 1307857 No, I want you to set
a fire so goddamn big...

1307907 1311027 the gods will notice us again.
That's what I'm saying.

1311077 1313697 I want all of you boys to be able
to look me straight in the eye...

1313737 1318207 one more time and say,
"Are we having fun or what?"

1318247 1320377 - Hey, you! What's your name?
- Huh?

1322417 1325757 - I feel like a little worm
on a big fucking hook.

1325797 1328217 "I feel like a little worm
on a big fucking hook."

1328297 1332677 Well, boy, your mama
must be damn proud of you!

1335137 1337767 How the hell did
that thing get in here?

1341767 1346397 Let me go!
Let me go! I gotta go!

1360287 1362337 I'm not sure
about the face though.

1372797 1375257 I see you have
made your decision.
1376847 1378807 Now let's see you enforce it.

1378887 1382557 Aw, this is already boring the shit
out of me. Kill him!

1433947 1436737 Right here! Here, help me!
He's gonna kill me!

1549687 1552607 Guess it's not a good day
to be a bad guy, huh, Skank?

1552687 1555897 I'm not Skank.
There's Skank right there.

1574087 1577507 That's all she wrote!
Move and we shoot!

1586597 1589477 You are surrounded by police units.
Do not attempt to escape.

1604327 1609117 Stop immediately.
Lie down, spread your arms and legs...

1663967 1666347 So many cops, you'd think
they were giving away donuts.

1675817 1678727 Oh. I knew you
were gonna do that.

1681317 1684277 The whole city oughta be
in flames by now.

1687617 1691957 So that, I take it,
is the late, great Eric Draven.

1691997 1697707 He has power, but it is power
you can take from him.

1697797 1700757 - I like him already.
- The crow...

1700837 1705297 is his link between
the land of the living...
1705387 1707717 and the realm of the dead.

1707807 1712347 So, kill the crow
and destroy the man.

1788587 1791057 You're gonna say
I shouldn't be in the cemetery...

1791097 1793177 in the middle
of the night, right?
1793217 1795017 Safest place in the world to be.

1795057 1799857 It's 'cause everybody's dead.
I knew you'd come here.

1807027 1810987 You're just gonna have
to forgive me for that.
1821627 1824877 I gave this to Shelly once.

1828587 1831547 I think she'd like you
to have it.

1858657 1862497 I better go sneak
back in the house.

1920427 1924557 What is that? Some sort of souvenir
there from your pal?

1926147 1929277 I'll just keep it for good luck.

2002847 2006187 Give me the girl
and I'll let you walk out of here.

2009397 2013147 Why don't you just give me a minute

2041257 2045807 Well, well, well. It does seem to me
that our little life has undergone...

2045887 2049727 a rather significant change in the past
few minutes now. Wouldn't you agree?

2054067 2057447 Well, for a ghost,
you bleed just fine.

2060987 2063237 - It's still alive.
- Well, then kill it!

2114377 2116507 Well, just came by
to pay my respects...

2116547 2118587 and here you are
getting all shot up again.

2125467 2128017 I'm not worried.
Look, here's the plan.

2128057 2130847 You stay in front, and when they
run out of ammo, I'll arrest 'em.

2130897 2134647 That sounds like a great plan.
There's just one problem.

2137277 2140817 Oh, shit.
You're bleeding all over the place.

2140907 2142947 I thought, you know,
you were invincible.

2146577 2150787 Well, I guess you really will
need my help, won't you?

2188577 2192037 - You were supposed to stay behind me.
- I think I messed up.

2216147 2219397 This is all the power
you ever had.

2266357 2269277 You can have me.
I won't fight you.

2269277 2270987 You can have me.
I won't fight you.

2360077 2362247 You know,
my daddy used to say...

2364917 2367047 and you can't rest
till you find him."

2367127 2369677 What happened back there
with you and your girlfriend...

2372757 2376017 Hell, nothing in this town
happens without my say-so.

2376097 2378937 So I'm sorry if I spoiled
your wedding plans, friend.

2379017 2381847 But if it's any consolation
to you...

2381937 2385567 you have put
a smile on my face.

2385647 2388277 You got a lot
of spirit, son.
2388317 2390947 I am going to miss you.

2472067 2474607 What you kept in here
saved me.

2477907 2480907 I've been meaning
to come to church anyway.

2488747 2493757 I'm quitting as of now...
if I live.

2547477 2552317 - All right, what's going on in there?

2552397 2555107 At least it stopped raining, huh?

2555147 2558567 - It can't rain all the time.

2558657 2561987 - This nightmare your fault, Albrecht?
- Look, you go on home.

2564037 2568617 - Want to tell me what's going on?
- Your vigilante's up on the roof.

2644867 2647907 If the people we love

2647997 2653077 the way to have them live on

2653167 2659047 Buildings burn, people die,
